Show King Night () is a South Korean survival dance music audition show which aired on MBN.
Hosted by MC Boom with the judges, also known as Show King Maker, are Yoon Il-sang, Tak Jae-hoon, Roo'ra's Lee Sang-min, Koyote, Chaeyeon, and Super Junior's Leeteuk, it is a survival show featuring K-pop songs from the 1990s to 2000s that each participant must sing.
Round 1: I Don't Stop
The theme of this round is '''I Don't Stop (), which inspired from a song by ZAM.
In this round, each participant sings two consecutive songs, one from the 90s and the other from 2000s. It is called non-stop dance music remix'''. The two teams face off in a row without a break. After performance ended, 100 audiences must vote one of both participants. The winning participant of each order advances to the second round, while the losing is eliminated. However, each of the 6 judges can save the eliminated only once.
